source.name: Soil Climate Analysis Network (SCAN)
source.description: The SCAN data retrieval tools provides an interactive process to identify and retrieve data from individual SCAN sites. The user does not need to know the ID for the site but must know either it's general location or the name of the site

datasets.name: Soil Climate Analysis Network (SCAN)
